commitResults.messageTitle: back-tracked and removed GUI, gradle, etc. in order to see if scanner would start working again. success.
added list functionality; can add and list items from tasklist, now.
added level-3 functionality, and Task class. did a little error handling to be secure.
added beginnings of level-4 functionality. todo, deadline, and event class work in progresses
work in progress of level-4. some functionality, though times have an issue with returning null
level-4 completed functionality; could use some revisions with formatting, but it still works.
cleaned up code, added further inheritance to improve functionality
level-5 error handling. added DukeException class, though it does not do anything yet.
manages to write text into duke.txt, though reformatting will be necessary
changed file writing format for better readability
duke.txt updates when tasks are added or completed in the list
can read and parse text in duke.txt upon opening Duke. can continue adding onto list, update completion status, etc. even after closing and reopening the program.
beginnings of level-8; attempting to use java libraries to parse certain strings into dates
Duke now recognizes dates in a certain format and re-formats them in its responses accordingly; certain times cannot be reformatted to dates. these remain the same when printed out by Duke
cleaned up a few edge cases/clunky sections of code
changed array to array list in order to make removal of tasks easier, and updated relevant methods. updated read/write methods for saving data
added more thorough method for handling errors involving excessive whitespace, and changed output of Duke when faced with inability to read data file

beginnings of ui-text-testing. new work-in-progress files for input and expected output when Duke is running through runtest.sh--it will run through commands, and compare expected values to what is actually printed
reorganizing classes into packages, working to incorporate TaskPackage into runtest.sh--still needs work
further updates to text-ui-test feature; compiler can reference most files in src/main/java folder, though it cannot access data.txt yet.
'find' method is functional. will return to test more thoroughly and make sure variety of input can be handled
improving functionality of the 'find' feature for level-9; can parse request in a manner that is no longer case-sensitive
further improvement for methods involving user input; whitespace is trimmed from input to keep Duke's output/list cleaner.
removed DukeException class due to its lack of usage.

furthered OOP within Duke by designating classes for roles within the program. Ui handles user interactions, Parser modifies the input string to make it usable, TaskList keeps the provided tasks organized, and Storage reads/updates/writes in the hardcoded data file. Methods within Ui that were originally in Duke class have been updated to have less parsing, and more functionality/error-checking

altered Ui class handleInput() to fix bug: user no longer has to insert an extra line of input in order to quit program. Storage class received modifications to clean up its appearance (streamlining imports, declaring hardcoded file to reference)

finalized text-ui-test formatting. fixed issue with referencing data.txt by added file where it can be located by relative path in Duke class. cleaned up filePath so that it can be referenced more easily between classes. got rid of string responses that were not being used.

beginnings of JUnit tests have been created. access modifiers for Ui Class have been modified to improve encapsulation. removed DukeException class entirely due to its lack of use. Storage class can now handle cases where referenced save file cannot be found; will create new file and record information there.
reformatting to make code more space-effective. more flexibility in date-parsing. added 'ToDo' test file. continued organizing 'Ui' test file
completed beginnings of JUnit tests for ToDo, Event, and Deadline classes, and cleaned up formatting of various areas of code (mainly deleting unused methods).
finished test suite; contains tests for functionality of public methods for Parser, Ui, TaskList, Storage, Duke, and all Task-related classes.
updates to javadocs; provides clarifications for more complicated methods/classes for Duke and Parser.
further documentation for TaskList and Ui; clarifies purpose of classes and methods.
Completed JavaDocs, meant to give more clarification about functionality of classes and their corresponding methods.
removing unnecessary classes that were compiled when testing code
added further documentation to methods/classes within Duke, Parser, Storage, TaskList, and Ui classes.
